preconditions.precondition: Batch Submitter navigates to EDRMS Documentation Section

successEndConditions.condition: Batch Submitter successfully accesses Ingest Process Documentation

mainSequence.step: Batch Submitter navigates to EDRMS Documentation Section
Batch Submitter provides credentials for authentication
EDRMS Website requests Ingest Process Docs
Documentation Server sends the documentation link to EDRMS Website
EDRMS Website displays the documentation link to Batch Submitter
Batch Submitter clicks the documentation link
EDRMS Website redirects to Ingest Process Documentation
Ingest Process Documentation displays the Ingest Process Documentation to Batch Submitter
